title: Makes conviction of certain criminal offenses grounds for divorce
summary: Makes the conviction of a husband or wife of a class A felony, class B or C violent felony or a felony sex offense a ground for divorce.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2626

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to  grounds  for
         an action for divorce

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 170 of the domestic relations  law  is  amended  by
    2  adding a new subdivision 8 to read as follows:
    3    (8)  UPON  SENTENCING  OF THE DEFENDANT AFTER CONVICTION FOR A CLASS A
    4  FELONY, CLASS B OR C VIOLENT FELONY AS DEFINED IN SECTION 70.02  OF  THE
    5  PENAL LAW, OR FELONY SEX OFFENSE AS DEFINED IN ARTICLE ONE HUNDRED THIR-
    6  TY OF THE PENAL LAW.
    7    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
    8  have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07451-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to grounds for an action for divorce
